item.title: Doc Test of Stone
item.description: Hugo Installation on Windows 10 Download the according Hugo zip file for Windows 10 from Hugo Releases. Extract the zip file and you will see one executable and a couple markdown files. Copy hugo.exe to your root folder, i.e. C:\Hugo\bin. Open Control Panel, find All Control Panel Items and then System; add your Hugo path (i.e.C:\Hugo\bin) to your Environment Variables as both in User Variables and System Variables; click OK to all buttons.
